skillTree.localised_description: A mighty Daemon Engine, clad in brass armour and driven into battle on iron-shod wheels.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can never have its Melee Attack reduced during battle.

skillTree.localised_description: Skulltaker’s is the most dreaded Juggernaut of all, a metal-plated beast of primordial rage that carries the Slayer of Kings to his doomed quarries.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can never have its Melee Attack reduced during battle.

skillTree.localised_description: Each victory reinvigorates Khorne's champions to seek more bloodshed.

effects.description: Replenishes 20% campaign movement range after winning a battle
Replenishes 10% campaign movement range after razing a settlement
Replenishes 30% campaign movement range after winning a battle
Replenishes 20% campaign movement range after razing a settlement

skillTree.localised_description: Fluttering and flouncing into battle is the way of the weak and self-indulgent. War should be waged Kharneth's way – with pure, unbridled savagery.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Slaaneshi factions

skillTree.localised_description: A small measure of Khorne's power rests in Skulltaker's bare hands. The power in his sword is another matter altogether.
At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.
Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.

effects.description:
Enemy fire resistance: -5%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy fire resistance: -10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Lords

skillTree.localised_description: "One scar is enough. For that, Sigmar's whelps will pay in full. As will all others. I do not believe in half-measures."

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for this Lord

skillTree.localised_description: No death is ever enough. Even if Skulltaker claims the greatest champion in all the realms, another will be born, and die in turn.

effects.description: Replenishes 5% campaign movement range after winning a battle
Replenishes 10% campaign movement range after winning a battle

skillTree.localised_description: "Other Khornites fear my presence, so I cannot imagine what it does to a mere mortal."

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +20% chance of wounding aggressors

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: Skulltaker's challenge is only aimed the  worthiest of the worthy. He pays no heed to its reverberations, but the aftermath is there for all to see.

effects.description: When winning a battle, the local province is marked by Khorne for the next +1 turns, increasing corruption and slowing enemy armies

Blood Hosts: +1 units on creation
	(all characters factionwide)
When winning a battle, the local province is marked by Khorne for the next +1 turns, increasing corruption and slowing enemy armies

Campaign movement range: +5% for Blood Hosts
	(all armies)

	(all characters factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Unique among Khorne's Chosen Champions is he, for none of his Bloodletter kin has ever challenged him, and not because of his title.

effects.description:
Daemons Reforged: +5% chance for destroyed Bloodletters units to be restored after battle
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The finest warriors, both mortal and immortal, have fallen to the Slayer Sword in mere seconds. Anyone who is less than that is a mere skull waiting to be collected.

effects.description: Enables "Inevitable End" contact effect (prevents incoming Healing)

Weapon strength: +20% when attacking
	(own armies in province)

related_attributes.bullet_text: A unit with Executioner will execute units in combat below a 20% hit points threshold.

skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!
"KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"
"Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"
With every other thought squeezed from their mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.
"None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"
"Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."
All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Feet of Khorne march across the corpses of their enemies, as the Teeth of Death crush the life from those yet to die.

skillTree.localised_description: There is no other choice. There never was.
Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption – as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

skillTree.localised_description: There is no stopping this one's slaughter, for they are driven by the unquenchable lust for battle.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
Battles can be lost, but can the war ever really be won? The advance of Ruin can never truly be halted once and for all.

factionEffects.localised_description: The greatest of Khorne’s chosen Bloodletters, Skulltaker imbibes a portion of every decapitated enemy’s strength, hooking the most prized skulls onto his cloak as mementos of his most powerful opponents.

effects.description: Has access to the Cloak of Skulls, allowing the Skulltaker to empower his faction by defeating powerful Lords
Daemons Reforged: +10% chance for destroyed Bloodletters units to be restored after battle

items.colour_text: A shard of Khorne's wrath made manifest. A foe's very soul speaks to it, begging for release, even as the flesh recoils, then gives way and parts without resistance.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "If he wants to find you, he will. When he challenges you, you cannot refuse. When he comes for you, you cannot stop him."

Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Bloodletter and Exalted Bloodletter units
	(Lord's army)
